Articles.Content: The HYPE is real!

I'm not sure if it's possible to have two different flags on the same part unfortunately. They would both be the same flag decal.

Could you have one flag be the hard-set as the Lazarus flag, and the other as the real flag decal?

Yukon1880: at the moment I don't have any plans to rescale anything. It just creates too many problems with misaligned IVAs and stuff. Glad you like the mod!

I think the Lazarus flag might be a bit too specific. Maybe I'll do a version with the KSP logo as the second flag or something.

Anyway, this is what I have so far. KAS will be required for the next update.

Yukon1880: at the moment I don't have any plans to rescale anything. It just creates too many problems with misaligned IVAs and stuff. Glad you like the mod!

I think the Lazarus flag might be a bit too specific. Maybe I'll do a version with the KSP logo as the second flag or something.

Anyway, this is what I have so far. KAS will be required for the next update.

http://i.imgur.com/lGBmunm.png

Oh man, that is sick!
this is just epic

Yukon1880:Anyway, this is what I have so far. KAS will be required for the next update.

Wouldn't KIS be a better choice, since the storage function will be phased out of KAS soon?

I'll switch to KIS when that happens, but for now it's KAS since I find that to be more stable and I think more people probably use it at the moment!

Added the inflatable and container modules:

Currently don't know how to make the inflatable only take crew when it's inflated - I'll look into how MKS and Porkjet's old inflatable habitats did it. It might turn out we need MKS as a dependency.

For the flags, would it be possible to include some form of texture switcher that could cycle through the flags?

Also, nice work on the modules, I'm really liking them.

I am crying in happiness right now.

THOSE ARE EPIC
Are you going to make the Ranger-Saturn VB adaptor? I really want to fly this.

Are you going to make the Ranger-Saturn VB adaptor? I really want to fly this.

It's not a Saturn VB, it's pretty clearly an INT-21, like what they used to launch Skylab.

It's not a Saturn VB, it's pretty clearly an INT-21, like what they used to launch Skylab.

*researches* Wait, but didn't Cooper say "Third stage separation" in the movie, and didn't the LV have side boosters?
Hey benjee, this is l4rg3singularity in a new account. The OP looks like a mess, would you mind if I can organise it? I have OCD so... :/
I'll be redoing the OP later today - stay tuned for the next release!

you must spread some reputation around before you can rep benjee10 again

Dangit!

EDIT: and now that I think about it, you should use KIS instead of KAS. More updated, better inventory GUI, less part count.

Edited April 4, 2015 by Rolanvorxariat

*researches* Wait, but didn't Cooper say "Third stage separation" in the movie, and didn't the LV have side boosters?

No, the last callout was "second stage separation" and besides, the two Rangers wouldn't fit on top of the S-IVB.

Update is live!

Also, since the pack has basically achieved all of its original goals, should I get this moved to releases? I will still continue development, I just feel like it sitting here in development perhaps makes people feel that it is lacking in features/quality or something.

Ranger couldn't have been more than 20 to 30 metric tonnes. The launcher as shown in that movie (while probably meant, in the artist's less-than-expert minds to bee Saturn V) was most likely completely new hardware.
badass!
Looks very cool, I played around with it last night and found the hard way that it doesn't support FAR, could FAR support be added?

Looks very cool, I played around with it last night and found the hard way that it doesn't support FAR, could FAR support be added?

Stock Drag fix works really good and you don't have to worry about all the FAR support.
I don't tend to play with FAR but shall look into it! The aero will probably need a complete rebalance anyway after 1.0 hits.

It still needs those Ranger adapters, I was thinking 1 Ranger-3.75m stack, and 2 Ranger-5m stack adapters.

And of course, congrats on the update.

And a seperate part for the Ranger docking adaptors.

Edited April 4, 2015 by billbobjebkirk
Yes, please make a full release thread. I think it is time. And can you give us a full changelog?

You can find the whole changelog on the Kerbal Stuff page or in the ReadMe with the download.

Thread moved to Releases! Also started work on adapters. Should have something tomorrow.

Edited April 4, 2015 by benjee10
